attributes.action: Consider: Castration a compulsory punishment and procedure funded by government carried out by the NHS re offenders Sex Crimes against Women & Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Where it is proven beyond doubt that offenders have committed Sex Crimes in violation against Women and Children the offenders be Castrated as a compulsory measure and strong deterrent against the crime being committed again and again. 

The procedure to remove the genitals to be carried out by the NHS and funded by the  government.  The procedure to be carried out as soon as sentence is passed, the offender/s not then requiring to be accommodated in HM prisons. 

Human Rights: The offender has violated the human rights of the victim/s therefore the offender  foregoes any human rights of their own related to this crime.

Advertising re punishment against such crimes once bill is passed.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/peadophiles/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
